EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Happy New Year from the TCS Team! Because you signed up for one of our opportunities and are considered an Active Grad, we have another exciting opportunity for you to get involved in below! But first, Sales Ambassador training!
Thanks for expressing your interest in volunteering alongside our Sales Team as a Sales Ambassador in schools and colleges in your area! Training dates are listed below, please pick ONE date that you can attend.
Tuesday 19th January 4:30pm at The Challenge Office, Elizabeth House, Waterloo, SE1 7N OR Wednesday 20th January 5:30pm at Wandsworth Training & Resource Centre, Alma Road, SW18 1AQ OR Wednesday 27th January 5:30pm at Ealing Green Church, Ealing Green, W5 5QT OR Monday 15th February 10:00am at The Challenge Office, Elizabeth House, Waterloo, SE1 7NQ
Training sessions will last around 2 hours. Please note that you have to attend training to be an NCS Ambassador. NCS Ambassadors are eligible to gain the TCS Bronze, Silver or Gold award.
What the job entails:
Sales Ambassadors get the opportunity to help promote the NCS programme to other young people! You will be helping our Sales team at school assemblies, information stalls and sales rallies and will be talking about your experiences of NCS and encouraging other young people to sign up to the programme.
Being a Sales Ambassador also comes with lots of benefits which include helping you build on many skills such as:
Communication Presenting Public speaking Self confidence!
A job role like this will also receive great recognition from universities and future employers, so it will look great on your CV and personal statement! If you would like any more information about this job role please find the job description attached.
Please free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions, we look forward to seeing you there!
Want to get involved in another amazing opportunity? Free The Children want you to volunteer at their concert in Wembley Stadium! We'll even write you a letter (if you need it to get out of school). Find out more and register here. Register under this code: GR-NCS2016 so they know you are an Active NCS GRAD!
